thread.title: Graham Norton shows Daniel Radcliffe all his dead female lookalikes | Metro News
thread.title_full: Graham Norton shows Daniel Radcliffe all his dead female lookalikes | Metro News

author: Olivia Waring For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Graham Norton shows Daniel Radcliffe all his dead female lookalikes | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news follow us graham norton

text:
Follow us Graham Norton shows Daniel Radcliffe more of his dead lookalikes from history — and they’re all women Olivia Waring for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 1:35 pm Daniel Radcliffe is constantly amazed by how many lives he has lived in the past (Picture: BBC) Sponsored 13 realities of going wedding dress shopping 
But now Graham Norton has unearthed even more of the actor’s ‘past lives’ thanks to bizarre, uncanny photos of his lookalikes from across history. 
And sadly for Harry Potter star Dan, they’re all female. What a blow to his wizarding street cred. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Graham seemed to take delight in the range of time periods Daniel has knowingly or unknowingly visited. 
But the star himself seemed simply bemused, uttering a sarcastic ‘oh, good’ when Graham told him a new lookalike had been found. Daniel in 1922, during the Second World War, in the early 20th century and in the 1950s (Pictures: YouTube) 
‘It’s very rarely men or boys,’ said Daniel, sadly. More
